title: New: Soda Fabric – Antonia
content:
So this comes straight out of the ‘How To Sound Like The Drums’ book, but hey, who doesn’t love a good dose of upbeat indie-pop every now and then? Soda Fabric, are a four piece (surprise surprise!) from Atlantis, that have all the vigour and energy of the early 80’s post-punk artists, with the slick touch of modern contemporaries.

Antonia, a frenetic three and a half minutes of hook based pop might not be breaking any boundaries, however who’s to say it’s not enjoyable?
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
